    svc := s3.New(sess)

    params := s3.PutBucketWebsiteInput{
        Bucket: bucket,
        WebsiteConfiguration: &s3.WebsiteConfiguration{
            IndexDocument: &s3.IndexDocument{
                Suffix: indexPage,
            },
        },
    }

    if len(*errorPage) > 0 {
        params.WebsiteConfiguration.ErrorDocument = &s3.ErrorDocument{
            Key: errorPage,
        }
    }

    _, err := svc.PutBucketWebsite(&params)
